name: Gun Gun Evolution
description:
Gun Gun Evolution is a top down shooter with your gun becoming more powerfull each level. Made for Ludum Dare 32.

This version is a post-compo version, which means I did a few changes after the jam ended, so you can´t rate the game on the LD page based on the expirience you had with this version.

I mostly fixed the enemies spawning outside the game-area bug and improved the difficulty
